doc:
Margaret Cho https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Cho 0 Margaret Moran Cho (Hangul: 조모란; Hanja: 趙牡丹; born December 5, 1968) is an American stand-up comedian, actress, fashion designer, author, and singer-songwriter. Cho is best known for her stand-up routines, through which she critiques social and political problems, especially regarding race and sexuality. She rose to prominence after creating and starring in the ABC sitcom All-American Girl (1994–95), and became an established stand-up comic in the subsequent years. She has also had endeavors in fashion and music, and has her own clothing line. Cho has also frequently supported LGBT rights and has won awards for her humanitarian efforts on behalf of women, Asian Americans, and the LGBT community. As an actress, she has acted in such roles as Charlene Lee in It's My Party and John Travolta's FBI colleague in the action movie Face/Off. Cho was part of the cast of the TV series Drop Dead Diva on Lifetime Television, in which she appeared as Teri Lee, a paralegal assistant. In 2012 she was nominated for an Emmy Award for her guest starring role as Dictator Kim Jong-il on 30 Rock. Margaret_Moran_Cho ( Hangul : 조모란 ; Hanja : 趙牡丹 ; born December_5_,_1968 ) is an_American_stand-up_comedian , actress , fashion_designer , author , and singer-songwriter . Cho is_best_known for her_stand-up_routines , through which she critiques social_and_political problems , especially regarding race_and_sexuality . She rose to prominence after creating_and_starring in the_ABC_sitcom_All-American_Girl_(_1994 – 95_) , and became an_established_stand-up_comic in the_subsequent_years . She has_also_had endeavors in fashion_and_music , and has her_own_clothing_line . Cho has_also_frequently_supported LGBT_rights and has_won awards for her_humanitarian_efforts on behalf of women , Asian_Americans , and the_LGBT_community . As an_actress , she has_acted in such_roles as Charlene_Lee in It 's My_Party_and_John_Travolta 's_FBI_colleague in the_action_movie_Face/Off . Cho was part of the_cast of the_TV_series_Drop_Dead_Diva on Lifetime_Television , in which she appeared as Teri_Lee , a_paralegal_assistant . In 2012 she was_nominated for an_Emmy_Award for her_guest_starring_role as Dictator_Kim_Jong-il on 30_Rock .
